name: Roots Chase
description:
Welcome to the game Roots Chase.

In this fun game for two players, you control a brave mole searching for food in a maze filled with challenges.

Running against the clock, you must be quick and smart to collect as much food as possible before time runs out.

The player who collects the most food in the end wins!

Challenge your friends and show that you are the most skilled mole.

CONTROLS

  • Player 1: W, A, S, D.
  • Player 2: up arrow, left arrow, down arrow, right arrow.
